channel.title: Looking for tutor
channel.description:
Hello all, I have decided to get into private server making. I am looking for someone to help me with adding the following kind of things to a base, as everything after that i will most likely learn myself:
[ul][li]Combat[/li] [li]Eating[/li][/ul]
Etc...
This is mainly what i need help on making. Can someone PLEASE help me! Pm or post on here.....i have pretty much every type of im account so just specify which you will use IF your going to use one. ALSO, I already have the base all setup, it just needs to be actually messed with now ;P
Thanks in advance, Samy109

item.title: Looking for tutor
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Learn the basics using Sun’s Java Tutorial and apply it to writing private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for tutor
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

I’d love to help you but I’m not a very good coder. I’m only just starting to understand the language.

Unfortunately, you’re not allowed to request for anyone here. =[
This might get locked, so good luck

Read full topic
